1.name: Default
1.description: First ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers - Kamikaze

limitBreak.tier2: Max Torpedo Capacity +1 / Pre-Loaded Torpedo +1 / Torpedo +10%
limitBreak.tier3: Upgrades Full Barrage I→II / All Weapon Efficiency +5%

1.name: Body of War
1.description: 4% chance to activate when main cannon is fired, increase own Evasion by 20% (50%) for 8s

2.name: First Destroyer
2.description: 10% (30%) to activate upon receiving a torpedo hit/miss: For 4 seconds, decrease torpedo damage taken by 20% (50%) and increase own torpedo stat by 20% (50%)

3.name: Full Barrage
3.description: Every 15 (10) times the main cannon is fired, trigger Full Barrage - Kamikaze-class I (II)

1.chinese: 神风级驱逐舰一号舰神风
1.chineseTL: First ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers - Kamikaze
1.japanese: 神風型駆逐艦一番艦・神風
1.japaneseTL: First ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers - Kamikaze.

2.chinese: 神风级驱逐舰一号舰神风，隶属第一驱逐队，听起来就很厉害对吧～嘻嘻，别看这样，我可是舰队里的老前辈了哟。从大战初期一直奋战到了战争结束，太平洋及阿留申群岛方面、马六甲、马来半岛，都有过我活跃的身影哟～对潜战我可是很擅长的呢～哎呀呀～现在想起和白鹰的狼群们那场生死决战还是会忍不住热血沸腾呢～
2.chineseTL: First ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyer - Kamikaze, assigned to the First Destroyer Division - sounds awesome, doesn't it~ Hehe, don't judge me by my looks, I am the elder of this fleet. I fought hard form the start till the end of the Great War; I saw service in the Pacific, Aleutian Islands, Malacca and Malay Peninsular~ I'm quite good at anti-submarine warfare~ Ahhhh~ Just thinking back on that life-or-death battle with the Eagle Empire wolf packs, really makes my blood boil~
2.japanese: 神風型駆逐艦の一号艦、神風じゃ。第一駆逐隊に所属したわっちのこの名は、力強い響じゃろ?（笑）大戦初期から太平洋諸島で転戦し、伊達や酔狂で艦隊の大先輩をやっておらんのじゃ。こう見えても、対潜は得意じゃ。あの狼の群れとやらとの死闘を思い出度に血が滾るよのう~
2.japaneseTL: First ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers, Kamikaze.I was known as a member of DesDiv 1, ain't that sound strong? Oho~, been fighting since the beginning of the war around the Pacific Islands, my style craziness doesn't make me a good senior. Despite my appearance, anti submarine is my forte. Just thinking about the battle against that wolf pack got my blood boiling~

3.chinese: 第一驱逐队第一号驱逐舰——神风来也~你就是指挥官吗~？ 看来往后的日子会很有趣呢~哼哼，期待我的表现吧~
3.chineseTL: The first destroyer of the First Destroyer Division - Kamikaze~ Are you the Commander?~ Looks like there shall be interesting days to come~ Hng hng, look forward to my performance~
3.japanese: 第一駆逐隊、第一号駆逐艦ーー神風、参上じゃ。お主が指揮官とやらに相違ないかえ？これからは楽しくなるかのう。うふふ、わっちの働き、ご覧遊ばせ～
3.japaneseTL: From DesDiv 1, Kamikaze class first ship - Kamikaze, , reporting in. Are you sure you are the Commander? It will get interesting from here. Ufufu, please look forward to my performance~

4.chinese: 阿啦，你来了，今天要做些什么有趣的事情哪~~
4.chineseTL: Oh my, you've come - what interesting things shall we do today?~
4.japanese: あら、よぉ来たかのぉ～今日は何か面妖なことでもするんかえ？
4.japaneseTL: Oh my, you came~ what strange things shall we do today?

5.chinese: 嘻嘻~指挥官究竟是对人家哪里有兴趣呢~?
5.chineseTL: Hehe~ Which part of my does the Commander has an interest in?~
5.japanese: ほほぉ~指揮官はわっちのどこに興味があるんかえ？
5.japaneseTL: Hohoo~ I wonder where on me does the commander take interests in?

6.chinese: 玳瑁啊~虽然不及我，但也是个可敬的对手哪
6.chineseTL: Hawksbill huh~ Though not as good as me, she's still an formidable opponent.
6.japanese: 最後まで持ちこたえるのが勝ち組よ！
6.japaneseTL: Only those who last till the end can be the winner!

7.chinese: 能坚持到最后的才能称为赢家哦
7.chineseTL: Only those who last till the end can be called winners.
7.japanese: ホークビル！わっちほどではないが正に兵（つわもの）じゃな
7.japaneseTL: Hawksbill. Not exactly at my level but still a soldier.

8.chinese: 第五战队的大家都是好人哪
8.chineseTL: Everyone in the Fifth Fleet are good people~
8.japanese: 第五戦隊…良い奴らよのう…
8.japaneseTL: Those in the 5th fleet...Such good people...

10.chinese: 嘻嘻········指挥官的邪念都溢出来了呢，要给你驱驱邪吗
10.chineseTL: Hehe...Commander is having evil thoughts, shall I perform exocism?
10.japanese: ほれ、指揮官の煩悩が溢れんばかりよのう。わっちがお祓いしてやろうかえ？
10.japaneseTL: Heh~, worldly desires are overflowing from the Commander. Shall I perform some purification?

11.chinese: 任务啊，要一起去看看吗
11.chineseTL: Task huh, want to take a look together?
11.japaneseTL: Public duties? Shall we go and take a look?

12.chinese: 嗯？任务完成的奖励下发了？运输奖励物资的时候可不能大意哦！
12.chineseTL: Hmm? The rewards for task completion are here? Don't get careless when transporting them!
12.japanese: はて？奉公の給金かえ?どれ、運ぶ時は気を使うんじゃぞ！
12.japaneseTL: Hmm? Pays from public duties? Be careful while transporting them!

13.chinese: 信啊…不会又是从白鹰那寄来的吧…
13.chineseTL: Mail huh...It couldn't be from the Eagle Empire again, is it...
13.japanese: 伝書…ユニオンのお使い、じゃないのかのう…
13.japaneseTL: Mail...not from the Union, would they...

14.chinese: 嗯哼，今天也平安了回来了呢，来尝尝我特制的健康饮料吧~~来吧，不要客气
14.chineseTL: Hmm, we came back safe and sound today as well. Come try my special-made wellness drink~ Come on, don't be shy.
14.japanese: そら、今日も無事帰れたのう！褒美にわっちの栄養飲料でも飲め！ほれほれ～遠慮せんで
14.japaneseTL: Here, got back home safe and sound today too! You can even have my rewarded nutritious drink! Here here~don't be shy.

15.chinese: 今天也平安完成远征回来了呢！嗯嗯，很好！
15.chineseTL: They came back from the commission safe and sound today as well! Hmm, nice job!
15.japanese: 今日も委託とやらを無事来なしたか。うむ、大儀じゃ！
15.japaneseTL: You all come back from commissions safely today as well. Great job!

16.chinese: 状态绝佳~嘻嘻，感觉又能大闹一场了呢~
16.chineseTL: My condition is perfect~ Hehe, feels like I can go wreck havoc again~
16.japanese: うむ、元気溌剌じゃ~（笑）これでまた大暴れできるよのう~
16.japaneseTL: UmU, all strong and lively now~ Oho, I feel like I can go wreck havoc again~

17.chinese: 注意鱼雷和潜艇，全力以赴的上吧。
17.chineseTL: Watch out for torpedoes and submarines. Let's give our all.
17.japanese: 潜水艦と魚雷には注意せえ。全力で行くのじゃ！
17.japaneseTL: Keep a look out for torpedoes and submarines. Going out at full force!

18.chinese: 看到了吗，这就是年长者的实力！
18.chineseTL: Did you see that? That's the power of a senior!
18.japanese: ほれ！これぞ年季による実力じゃ!
18.japaneseTL: Look at this! This is a veteran's skill!

19.chinese: 呜咕·······果然性能已经跟不上了吗
19.chineseTL: Guu...my performance cannot keep up huh.
19.japanese: うぐぅ…この性能じゃやはり追いつけんかのう…
19.japaneseTL: Ugh...so my performance just can't catch up...

20.chinese: 抱歉，现在没单挑的时间呦
20.chineseTL: Sorry, now is not the time for a duel.
20.japanese: 一騎打とはいかずすまんのう
20.japaneseTL: Now is not the time to duel.

22.chinese: 指挥官…意外地没什么意思呢……
22.japanese: 指揮官は存外つまらぬ輩よのう
22.japaneseTL: Commander is one surprisingly boring fellow.

23.chinese: 只有愚者和菜鸟，才会用装备新旧来评估舰船的实力哟，指挥官～
23.chineseTL: Only fools and rookies would judge a ship's performance by the age of their equipment, Commander~
23.japanese: 指揮官。装備を新旧で評するのは丁稚三下のすることじゃ
23.japaneseTL: Commander. Only rookies would judge by equipment and age.

24.chinese: 嗯？平时的兴趣？吃饭睡觉逗指挥官？啊哈哈，没错，就是喜欢看指挥官这种一脸困扰的表情～
24.chineseTL: Hmm? My hobbies? It's eating, sleeping and teasing the Commander. Ahaha, that's right, I like seeing the confused look on the Commander just like now~
24.japanese: 趣味？三度の寝食に指揮官をいじることかのう。（大笑い）その顔が見たかったのじゃ
24.japaneseTL: My hobby? Hmm...3 rounds of eat and sleep with a side of teasing the commander. Ho~ho ho ho. I just like to see that face.

25.chinese: 嘻嘻，指挥官喜欢什么类型的女孩子呢～？像我这种的？还是更文静点的？——真的？录音完毕～哼哼，要给谁听好呢～
25.chineseTL: Hehe, what type of girls does the Commander like?~ Ones like me? Or perhaps the quieter type? ——Really? Alright, recording completed~ Hng hng, who shall I play it to~
25.japanese: はて、指揮官はどんな子が好みかのう～わっち？それともおしとやかな？ーーそれはまことか？そーれ、しかと録音したわい☆はて、その子に聞かせてやろうかのう-
25.japaneseTL: Hmm, Which type of girl would the Commander like~~ is it me? Or someone more gentle? ...Is that true? And...here, cleanly recorded☆ Now, should I let that kid hear this...

26.chinese: （悄声）最喜欢指挥官了～——嗯？指挥官很热吗～？耳根都红了呢～
26.chineseTL: *Whispers* I love the Commander~ ——Hmm? Does the Commander feel hot?~ Your ears are bright red~
26.japanese: （小声）指揮官…お主のこと、気に入っているのじゃ♡ーーはて、指揮官、顔が熱いのう~耳元まで真っ赤になっとるえ
26.japaneseTL: (Mumbling) Commander...I, like you♡ ...Hmm, Commander's face is all red~it's up to your ears.

27.chinese: 指挥官，现在还有反悔的时间哦~嗯嗯，你可以慢慢想，多考虑一点神风的事情也没关系的~嗯？门？哎呀，被谁不小心锁上了呢，真是太不小心了~
27.chineseTL: Commander, you still have time to back down now~ Yes, it's alright if you take your time and consider~ Hmm? The door? Oh my, who could have locked it by accident, how unfortunate~
27.japanese: 指揮官、今ならまだ翻意しても遅うないぞ～そうそう、じっくり、この神風のことをようお考え遊ばせ～うん？扉？はて、どうやら鍵をかけておったわい～まったく困ったものよのう～
27.japaneseTL: Commander, it's still not too late to take that back now~that's right, no rush, this Kamikaze do like that idea~ huh? The door? Oh dear, the door appears to be locked~truly unfortunate~

28.japanese: (???) まだ共に戦えるよのう～

29.japanese: 「指揮官のことが大好きです！受け取ってください！」…うむうむ、これはこれで青春なのじゃ♪

30.chinese: “指挥官，给你充满我爱情的巧克力！张嘴，啊～♡”快看快看，是情人节巧克力哦～！
30.japanese: 「指揮官、わっちの愛情たっぷりのチョコをあげる！はい、あーん♡」ほれほれ、バレンタインチョコじゃぞ～！
